caption.p: Co-expression network of lncRNAs and differentially expressed mRNAs related to ovarian development in H1 vs H3 ( A) H3 vs H8 ( B). Triangle and circle nodes represent lncRNAs and mRNAs, respectively. The nodes with red colour represent up-regulation whiles those with green colour represent down-regulation. The dotted line represents the target relationship between two nodes.
